sect1.title: The Question

para.emphasis: Exactly how do I get started learning Functional Programming?

listitem.para:
And each time I have three choices
Ignore the question
Give an answer that sounds easy, satisfies the enquirer, but I know deep down it won't help.
Honest up at the risk of sounding mean, nasty and totally confuzzling. <-- we are going to do this today.
